name: あさひ＆愛依
text:
『冬優子ちゃんに大変なご迷惑をおかけしたため、
お詫びになんでもします』
trans:
"For causing great inconvenience to Fuyuko-chan,
we will do anything as an apology"

name: 冬優子
text: ……って言ったの、忘れてないわよね？
trans: ...is what you said, you didn't forget it now, did you?

name: 愛依
text: え～、それ誰だし～
trans: Eh～ says who～

name: あさひ
text: 冬優子ちゃん、そのおっきい荷物どうしたんすか？
trans: Fuyuko-chan, what's up with that big bag?

name: 冬優子
text:
人の話を……
まあいいわ、準備にも時間かかるし
trans:
Listen when people talk...
Well whatever, preparation also takes time anyway.

name: 冬優子
text: 本当に、ふゆに悪いと思ってるなら……
trans: If you really feel guilty to Fuyu...

name: 冬優子
text: ふたりとも、これからふゆのお人形ね
trans: You two, from now become Fuyu's doll.

name: 愛依
text: へ？
trans: Huh?

name: あさひ
text: お人形……すか？
trans: Doll...?

name: 冬優子
text:
そ、ふゆの着せ替え人形
好きな服を着せて、好きなように髪もメイクもいじるの
trans:
Yeah, Fuyu's dress-up doll.
Fuyu get to toy you around by putting clothes, 
play with your hair and makeup as I like.

name: 冬優子
text: ヘアメ用のアイテム、わざわざ持ってきたんだから
trans:
I already go through the trouble 
of bringing along the makeup and stuff, after all.

name: 愛依
text: おぉ～！　これ冬優子ちゃんの！？　見たいんだけど！
trans: Ooh～! Is this Fuyuko-chan's? I want to see it!

name: 冬優子
text: 雑に扱わないならいいわよ
trans: As long as you don't use it roughly.

name: あさひ
text:
これも化粧道具なんすか？
何に使うんすかね？
trans:
Is this also a makeup tool?
I wonder what you use it for?

name: 愛依
text:
これだけで使うんじゃないんだよね～
こっちのパウダーをつけて、スタンプみたいにして……
trans:
Of course, we shouldn't use only these～
Put this powder on, then with this stamp-like thing...

name: 愛依
text:
──って！　こっちのやつ！
秒で売り切れたのじゃね！？
trans:
──! This one here!
Isn't this one sold out in a breeze!?

name: 愛依
text:
スゲー！
ねえねえ試してみてもいい！？
trans:
Woaahー!
Hey, can I try this?

name: 冬優子
text:
ちょっとだけならいいけど？
どうせ後で、一回愛依のメイク、全部落とすんだし
trans:
It's okay if it's only for a bit.
After all this, we will redo all of Mei's makeup anyway.

name: 冬優子
text: あとこれ、ふたりの着替え
trans: Also, this, it's your change of clothes.

name: 冬優子
text:
この前買い物行った時にサイズ見てたから、
たぶんぴったりなはずよ
trans:
Last time we went shopping Fuyu saw your size,
probably this will fit.

name: 愛依
text:
うちらの服……？
──え、うちがこれ着るの！？
trans:
Our clothes...?
──Eh, I will wear this!?

name: 冬優子
text:
トーゼン
あんたたちと違って繊細なんだから、丁寧に扱ってよね
trans:
Of course.
Unlike you two, these are delicate, so please handle it carefully.

name: 愛依
text:
え～
うちにはこういう系似合わなくない？
trans:
Eh～
I don't think this stuff suits me, though?

name: 冬優子
text:
似合うとか似合わないとか決めるのはあんたじゃないの
これはお願いじゃなくて、命令なのよ
trans: You're not to decide whether this will look good or not on you. This is an order, not a request.

name: 愛依
text: ……冬優子ちゃん、目がマジなんですけど……
trans: ...Fuyuko-chan, but your eyes are serious...

name: あさひ
text:
よくわかんないけど……
とりあえず着ればいいんすね？
trans:
Don't quite get it, but...
For now, I just need to wear it, right?

name: あさひ
text: じゃ、いってくるっす～
trans: Then, I'll be going～

name: 愛依
text:
早く鏡見たいんだけど！
ねえ見ちゃダメ！？
trans:
But I want to quickly see the mirror!
Hey, can't I look!?

name: 冬優子
text:
ダメ
今写真撮るから、それまでお楽しみ
trans:
You can't.
Now we're going take a photo, bear it until then.

name: 冬優子
text:
あ、それと愛依、これツイスタにアップするんだから
ちゃーんと営業用の顔しなさい
trans: Ah, and also Mei, because this will be uploaded to Twesta, make sure to put on your game face.

name: 愛依
text:
あ、そっかそっか、ん～……
──よし、イケる！
trans:
Ah, yeah I see, hm～
──Alright, I can do this!

name: あさひ
text:
冬優子ちゃん～
早くするっす～
trans:
Fuyuko-chan～
Quickly～

name: 冬優子
text:
はいはい
……じゃ、撮るわよ──
trans:
Yes yes.
...Then, say cheese──

name: あさひ
text: おお……
trans: Ooh...

name: 愛依
text:
すごくね！？　こういう系初めて着たんだけど！
あれ、うち案外イケてる！？
trans:
Awesome! This kind of fashion is my first time though!
Eh, I'm unexpectedly cool!?

name: 冬優子
text:
ふたりとも、完全に素じゃない
こんな写真アップできないわよ
trans:
You two, you looked no different than usual.
This photo can't be uploaded, you know.

name: 愛依
text:
あ、そかそか……
クールにクールに……
trans:
Ah, yeah I see...
Be cool. Be cool...

name: 愛依
text: ……やっぱ無理だって～！！
trans: ... Can't do it just as I thought～!!

name: 冬優子
text:
ったく……
でも、ま、そうでしょうね
trans:
Jeez...
But, well, I think so too.

name: 冬優子
text:
あんたたち、
黙って動かず何もせず口も開かなければ可愛いんだから
trans:
You two, as long as you move silently, do nothing, 
and close your mouth, you're cute just so you know.

name: 冬優子
text: たまにはその顔、有効活用させなさいよ
trans: Sometimes let's use that face effectively.

name: あさひ
text:
こんなちゃんと化粧したの
仕事以外だと初めてっす～……
trans: This is the first time I properly do makeup outside of work～...

name: 愛依
text:
そう！　メイクも冬優子ちゃん流でいつもと違うし！
このいいカンジのチーク、何使ってたっけ……！？
trans: Yup! The makeup is also Fuyuko-chan's style, different from usual! This one on my cheek, what were you using...!?

name: 冬優子
text: どうしてもって言うなら、後で教えてあげてもいいけど？
trans: If you really want to know, I can teach you later.

name: 愛依
text: マジー！？　神！
trans: Reallyー!? God!

name: あさひ
text:
でもこれ動きにくいっすね
何かあっても走れないっす
trans:
But this is hard to move around with.
If something happens, I can't run.

name: 冬優子
text: 走らなくていい
trans: You don't have to run.

name: 愛依
text:
あさひちゃんあさひちゃん、
後で一緒にツーショ撮ろ～！
trans:
Asahi-chan, Asahi-chan,
After this, let's both get a pic together～!

name: 愛依
text: もちろん、冬優子ちゃんも！
trans: Of course, Fuyuko-chan too!

name: 冬優子
text: はいはい、仕方ないわね
trans: Yes yes, can't be helped, huh.

name: あさひ
text:
このリボン、ぴらぴらしてて邪魔なんで、
引っ張ってみていっすか？
trans:
This ribbon, it's fluttering around and disturbing,
Can I try pulling this?

name: 冬優子
text: したらどうなるかわかってるでしょうね
trans: You know what will happen if you do, right?

name: 冬優子
text:
……ほんと、口開くとせっかく可愛くしたのが台無し
あんたたち、しばらく何も喋らないで
trans:
...Really, your mouth open for a bit
and your already cute appearance is ruined.
You two, don't speak anything for a while.

name: 冬優子
text: （……って言っても無駄か）
trans: (...is what I said, but it's useless, huh)

name: 冬優子
text: （でも、写真にやかましさは写らないし……）
trans: (But, the photo didn't capture them being noisy anyways...)

name: 冬優子
text: ……うん、悪くない、わね
trans: ...Yup, it's not bad.
